title: Introducing: Hozier
body:
_What are the Twenty First Century Blues? And who shall we find to sing them?_ (Hozier’s [Facebook page](https://www.facebook.com/pages/Hozier/167555553297787?id=167555553297787&sk=info))

Irish crooner **Hozier** (Andrew Hozier-Byrne) feels like he hails from a lost generation. His wistful charm and tear inducing soulful warble is quite unlike any other artist around at this present time. On his debut EP, there’s the out and out brash, piano led balladry of _Take Me To Church_, alongside the lovelorn stammer of _Like Real People Do_. There’s an underlying feeling of religious betrayal, of the realisation that perhaps faith isn’t as silky as the books of old would have you believe, and it’s partially this that makes **Hozier** such an engrossing listen. Thanks to [Feel Good Lost](http://www.feelgoodlost.me/) for the tip.
